body.name: Sugar Snap Plush Learn to Dress Doll for Toddlers - 15" - Doll for 2 Year Old Girl - Montessori Doll
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 21 hrs 30 mins
features: MONTESSORI TOY: Captures the spirit of the Montessori idea that kids learn better by working with materials rather than by direct instruction. Sugar Snap doll allows kids to learn while playing
LEARNING IS MORE NATURAL AND MORE FUN: Better than a busy board, because the sensory and motor skills features come in the form of a toy that kids already love
LEARN TO DRESS MADE FUN – Who knew getting dressed could be so much fun? Help kids practice again and again with this activity toy for kids, toddlers, and preschoolers
ZIP, ZIP, HOORAY! – Help this soft little doll get ready for the day! They'll love practicing their sensory and motor skills by pulling the zipper up and down, or tying her hair bow

BOOST SKILLS FAST: sensory and fine motor skills develop fast with this educational plush doll that makes learning fun and will make your little one love practicing for hours. A great toy to help learn to tie shoes for kids
body.description: Learning to dress is made fun for little ones to master with this activity doll toy with zippers, snaps, and buttons. Buttons and zippers and ties – oh, my! With so many things for toddlers to discover about getting ready for a busy day, it helps to have a friend come along. This huggable Sugar Snap plush doll is a great dress toy for kids ages 2 and up to practice different getting dressed activities. They'll love practicing pulling the zipper up and down, or tying her hair bow. Plus, the plush doll hair can be put into cute braids. Kids ages 2 and up can also practice buttoning buttons, buckling the velcro fastener on her shoe, and tying the other one, too! Give your kid a fun friend to help teach them discover how to dress for success! Your child can have more fun and make a deeper connection than with busy boards. Montessori toys for toddlers are perhaps the best way for a young child to learn. Keep your baby toddler entertained with simple dressing-themed activities and toys that can help them in a variety of ways later in life. Is a great toy for tying shoe practice. Give the children in your life toys that teach. Ideal for preschool teachers and makes a fun gift for girls too. Make learning fun! Improve hand and motor skills. Doll measures approximately 14" tall. She is dressed in fun bright rainbow colors. A great addition to your keepsake doll collection, perfect for a birthday gift, Christmas present, fun for everyday play or any occasion. Polyester. Spot clean. Imported.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 2 year old loved it.
reviews.reviewText: Educational, cute, fun & reasonable price.Made well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweet and fun little doll for toddlers
reviews.reviewText: This doll is adorable and wonderful for toddlers! It is made of soft material and has fun tactile buckles for fine motor skill development. My 2-year old loves buckling and unbuckling anything she can get her hands on and she’s obsessed with babies so this will make the perfect Christmas gift for her.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This cloth doll is so cute and so perfect for a two year old! I love that she can practice zippers and shoe wear on this doll. Colorful and very pretty!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good quality. Easy to use buttons, snaps, and zippers for small fingers. My 1 yr old loves it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute toy, but...
reviews.reviewText: I wish the dress would stay on. I might have to sew it to stay in place. I know toddlers should learn how to put their own clothes on and off, but I believe having that feature on this toy is not a good idea as the dress can easily get lost in a whirlpool of toys. Super cute otherwise, good quality, arrived on time, my daughter loves it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and functional.
reviews.reviewText: Good for teaching dressing skills for 2 year old girl.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The doll is so cute, she loves it.
reviews.reviewText: It was a gift for my great-granddaughter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My granddaughter loved her Christmas doll! She would not put it down and she has already learned how to unzip the zipper and is starting to tie the bow. Eliza is 1 1/2 years old.
